description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires the professional services of Stream 3: Technical and Technology Architects Level 3 available through the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement to work on projects and operational initiatives in support of business line clients.
full_summary:
================================

**NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT FOR TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Reference:** CB-906-51376727

### General Information

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFAIT) invites proposals for the provision of professional services under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement. The services are required to support the operational initiatives of the business line clients.

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** November 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2024, at 4:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 1, 2025
* **Expected Contract End Date:** December 31, 2025

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the provision of technical and technology services (TC Level 3) through the TBIPS Supply Arrangement. The services will be required to support projects and operational initiatives in support of business line clients.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria for this tender are the following:

* Technical merit: 50%
* Price: 30%
* Past performance: 10%
* Business plan: 10%

### Required Services

The required services include the provision of:

* Technical and technology services (TC Level 3)
* Support for projects and operational initiatives in support of business line clients

### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and any amendments, are available on the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51823/npp-25-268482.pdf

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Trent Clemenhagen
Global Affairs Canada
200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0G4
Phone: (343) 203-1308
Email: trent.clemenhagen@international.gc.ca

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Please refer to the tender description or tender documents for more information.

### Regions of Opportunity

The contract will be delivered in the following regions:

* Gatineau, QC

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity for this procurement is Global Affairs Canada. The contracting entity address is as follows:

* 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0G4,
